# UIContentUnavailableConfiguration

**Structure**

A content configuration for a content-unavailable view.

## Declaration

```swift
struct UIContentUnavailableConfiguration
```

## Overview

A content-unavailable configuration is a composable description of a view that indicates your app can’t display content. Using a content-unavailable configuration, you can obtain system default styling for a variety of different empty states. Fill the configuration with placeholder content, and then assign it to a view controller’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewController/contentUnavailableConfiguration-4b95e], or to a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIContentUnavailableView].

The following screenshot shows an example of a content-unavailable view configured by setting the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIContentUnavailableConfiguration-swift.struct/image], [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIContentUnavailableConfiguration-swift.struct/text], and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIContentUnavailableConfiguration-swift.struct/secondaryText] properties.



## Structures

- **UIContentUnavailableConfiguration.ButtonProperties**: Properties to configure buttons for a content-unavailable view.
- **UIContentUnavailableConfiguration.ImageProperties**: Properties to configure the image for a content-unavailable view.
- **UIContentUnavailableConfiguration.TextProperties**: Properties to configure text for a content-unavailable view.

## Instance Properties

- **alignment**: The alignment of the image, text, and buttons.
- **attributedText**: An attributed variant of the primary text.
- **axesPreservingSuperviewLayoutMargins**: Configures which margins use the layout margins inherited from the superview.
- **background**: The configuration for the background.
- **button**: The configuration for the primary button.
- **buttonProperties**: Additional configuration for the primary button.
- **buttonToSecondaryButtonPadding**: The padding between the primary button and secondary button.
- **directionalLayoutMargins**: The margins between the content and the edges of the content view.
- **image**: The image to display.
- **imageProperties**: The configuration for the image.
- **imageToTextPadding**: The padding between the image and the primary text.
- **secondaryAttributedText**: An attributed variant of the secondary text.
- **secondaryButton**: The configuration for the secondary button.
- **secondaryButtonProperties**: Additional configuration for the secondary button.
- **secondaryText**: The secondary text to display.
- **secondaryTextProperties**: Properties for configuring the secondary text.
- **text**: The primary text to display.
- **textProperties**: Properties for configuring the primary text.
- **textToButtonPadding**: The padding between the text and buttons.
- **textToSecondaryTextPadding**: The padding between the primary and secondary text.

## Type Methods

- **empty()**: Creates the default configuration for unavailable content.
- **loading()**: Creates the default configuration for content that’s loading.
- **search()**: Creates the default configuration for searches that return no results.

## Enumerations

- **UIContentUnavailableConfiguration.Alignment**: Constants to define the alignment of views in a content-unavailable view.

## Unavailable content configurations

- **UIContentUnavailableConfigurationState**: A structure that encapsulates state for a content-unavailable view.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomReflectable
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- UIContentConfiguration
